t:dummy.p: Note: do not download as a file. Play using your favourite media player, e.g. VLC
t:dummy.a: M3U playlist - the simplest there is, should always work. Originally mp3-centered though, so who knows
XSPF - the «cool» young XML based playlist technology. Should work on most modern systems
PLS - Old, originally used for Podcasts. Should work well.
ASX - Microsoft's Advanced Stream Redirector - Bør (dessverre?) funke meget bra
Direktelenke til strømmen - IKKE åpne denne i nettleser!
